document.discussion_title: Justin Bieber Parties in London Rihanna Model Bronte Blampied While Sofia Richie Stays in Los Angeles
document.topic_text: Bieber and RiRi were in England for the V Festival , but fans weren't thrilled with the Canadian singer's 'hungover' performance on Saturday. »
